title: Endless confirmation cycle of account update
body:
Anyone who experience this issue today?
After entering the client,the game force you  to change your account into "Riot account",than just stuck in the cycle of 3 web pages including "Account required to update","password confirmation" and "E-mail confirmation" ？？？？While I send a query to Riot support,they just dispatch a n AI(BLitz bot) to ask tons of info from me.Still waiting for a real human to help me.Cannot play this game right now!!!

replies.body:
Me, Dormammu, confess defeat!
